mapper.insert: insert into raffleDetail (rno, mid, rdtcreatedat, rdtmissioncleared, rdtberryspend) values (#{rno}, #{mid}, systimestamp, 'PEND', 0)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM raffle r INNER JOIN raffleDetail rd ON r.rno = rd.rno INNER JOIN timemission t ON r.rno = t.rno WHERE mid = #{mid} AND r.rno = #{rno} AND systimestamp BETWEEN t.tstartedat AND t.tfinishedat

select r.rno as "raffle.rno", r.rtitle as "raffle.rtitle", rdt.rno as "raffleDetail.rno", rdt.mid as "raffleDetail.mid", rdt.rdtcreatedat as "raffleDetail.rdtcreatedat", rdt.rdtmissioncleared as "raffleDetail.rdtmissioncleared", rdt.rdtberryspend as "raffleDetail.rdtberryspend" from raffle r INNER JOIN raffleDetail rdt ON r.rno = rdt.rno where rdt.mid = #{mid} AND rdt.rdtcreatedat between #{startdate} AND #{enddate}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail rd INNER JOIN raffle r ON rd.rno = r.rno WHERE r.rstartedat <= systimestamp AND systimestamp <= r.rfinishedat AND rd.mid = #{mid}
AND rd.rdtcreatedat BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail WHERE rno = #{rno}) AS totalEntry, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail WHERE rno = #{rno} AND rdtmissioncleared = 'PASS') AS missionCleared, ( SELECT SUM(rdtberryspend) FROM raffleDetail WHERE rno = #{rno}) AS berrySpend FROM dual
select * from raffleDetail where mid = #{mid} AND TRUNC(rdtcreatedat) = TRUNC(sysdate)
select count(*) from raffleDetail where mid = #{mid} AND rno = #{rno} AND TRUNC(rdtcreatedat) = TRUNC(sysdate) AND rdtmissioncleared = 'PASS'
